work.summary: Designed and optimized photoacoustic computed tomography systems to non-invasively visualize vascular structures and applied machine learning for image reconstruction and analysis. Developed quantum imaging systems leveraging entangled photon pairs to achieve super-resolution and sub-shot-noise sensitivity in biomedical imaging.
